basic.description:
Advanced seminar on authorship and analysis, generally concerning the work of a single film-maker. Subjects have included John Ford, Federico Fellini.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36L;24Lb;48P)
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Authorship: Special Topic I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110) and 18.0 units in FILM.
